name: Beta Tester
description:
"Beta Tester" is a small but cute 3d-puzzle-platformer game. It was created during Wowie Jam 2020. 

Story:
You are playing as someone who just got accepted in the newest beta-testing program. You are greeted by a shady-looking contract as soon as you arrive. As usual, you don't think much about it and press the "I Agree" button. Soon, you discover the things are not as you expected them to be.

Minimum Requirements:
We didn't test it, but it should run on a potato if you try hard enough. 

Who created this?
A team of three guys. Srđan (3D stuff & code), Goran (code), Filip (Audio) and Ivan (Video Editing)
